posts.post_content: while vanilla is annoying, at worst he is a bear with relevant types, and at best a 3/3 intimidate with a tribe meant to be pumped and work together, most likely making him much bigger. not bad for two mana.

posts.post_content:
This is a great tempo play. Really can lay it on an opponent. 3 unblockable damage ends games very, very quickly. Forcing removal out of a 2 drop can mean trouble for an opponent.  
  
In what possible way is a 3/3 intimidate werewolf for 2 vanilla?

Posted By: TherealphatMatt (9/23/2011 8:03:30 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I like the flavor of the card a lot.  
  
This is obviously going to be successful in a werewolf deck. With all of the +X bonuses that werewolves give off, I believe this card might be overpowered with intimidate and a higher power.  
  
I can see this getting up to 7/7 or 8/8 easily. 7-8 unblockable damage.
